product.name: Liquid Liner
product.description:
12 hours of long-lasting intense color, transfer-free (leaves no trace on crease above the eyelid) Pure Light CaptureÂ® minerals deliver color and radiance. Silky lines and refreshingly light, Pure Argan eyeliner leaves a weightless feel on the eyelids.
